To those getting the "Insert Disk" error. Did you have trouble overwriting the .exe file in the no disk crack? 

I had the same error. It turned out to be that 7-zip (my rar extractor) didn't have permission to overwrite program files in Windows 7 (may also apply to Vista). 

Run your extractor as an Administrator (there is a special option when right clicking on the program in Win7) and try again. Hope this helps.

Obviously it wont work unless u overwrite with the crack. 

For those who experience crashes, you probably need a better PC.
Fast download, quick and easy install AND the game works! : ) thanks a lot! :D

For all the people who keep having the "insert original disk" message, make sure you copy over the .exe file. If your computer says you can't, then make sure you have the correct permissions by right clicking on the .exe file, going to properties, security, and setting the permissions.

As soon as the game starts up and i click ANYTHING that has to do with actually playing the game it Exits Right to desktop, this is excatly like another torrent i tryed to downlode, what a waste of 2 days.

Guys, the crack is in the folder that says "Crack" on the disc itself. Get a program like PowerISO to open the disc, and the keygen and crack are in that folder. After you install, go to C:\Program Files\Lucas Arts\Star Wars Battlefront II and copy the crack into the "Gamedata" folder. Easy-peasy.

It amazes me how stupid people are. Why even bother pirating if you don't know the basics of getting a damn game to work? Seriously, if you can't even figure out how to crack/mount a game then don't fucking download it in the first place. People these days I swear, get a fucking brain.

For those who don't know where to put the crack EXE. type this into your URL bar in My Computer.

C:\Program Files (x86)\LucasArts\Star Wars Battlefront II\GameData

If that doesn't work, go into the hardrive your installed items go to, then go to LucasArts. Then Star Wars Battlefront II then GameData and replace the battlefront II application. Then doubble click your replaced file and it will open like a beauty ;)

Hope this helped some :)

Can't find the crack for this!?!?

WHEN PLAYING BF2 w/ VISTA OR 7 (there is going to be an audio card issue)You have 2 options; 1) disable audio card (nosound ingame) 2) go find a torrent called VIRTUAL AUDIO CABLES (much like DEAMON, its a virtual audio card. once you install VAC make sure default windows audio device is set to Virtual Cable, start the AUDIO REPEATER that comes with VAC, repeat VA1 into you default device. (edit buffer lengths to allow for less sound lag) VIOLA!
Can we play through lan?

If you are having problems running this game via LAN here is what you need to do:

1. Download battlefront 2.iso
2. Mount the disc and install the game
3. Go to ftp://ftp.lucasarts.com/patches/pc/BFIIUpdateInt1_1.exe to download the patch
4. Install the patch
5. Run the game
6. Play a LAN game

This works on XP but I don't know about Vista or 7.
